Welcome to Humble Bundle API’s documentation!¶

Modules

class bundle_service.BundleService(cache: network_cache.NetworkCache)[source]¶

This is where the data for your Humble Bundle library can be accessed

get_all_bundle_ids()[source]¶

Returns a list of bundle IDs stored in the local cache which is an instance of network_cache.NetworkCache

Can be used if you need to iterate over all your different bundles, for example to query for their data

Returns

List of bundle IDs

Return type

list

get_all_bundles_with_metadata()[source]¶

Returns a dictionary whose keys are bundle IDs and whose values are also dictionaries.

Each bundle ID holds a dictionary containing all data returned from the network call for the bundle.

An example dictionary could look like this:

{
    "amount_spent":15.0,
    "product":{
        "category":"bundle",
        "machine_name":"my_bundle",
        "empty_tpkds":{},
        "post_purchase_text":"",
        "human_name":"My Bundle",
        "partial_gift_enabled":true
    },
    "gamekey":"2idt2IDidD7IdBi",
    "uid":"IDIDIDIDIDIDI",
    "all_coupon_data":[
        {
            "coupon_min_count":null,
            "coupon_valid_products":[],
            "coupon_type":"relative-discount-plan",
            "coupon_discount":10.0,

            "coupon_credit":null,
            "coupon_max_count":null,
            "subscriptions":[
                "humble_monthly"
            ],
            "coupon_exclude_monthly":false,

            "coupon_stack":false,

Discount will be automatically applied at time of checkout. Coupon has no cash value. Void where prohibited or restricted by law. Coupon may not be reproduced, copied, purchased, traded or sold. Unauthorized transfer of coupon and internet distribution strictly prohibited."

class network_cache.NetworkCache[source]¶
get(key: str) → any[source]¶
get(key)[source]¶

Returns the value from the network cache corresponding to the provided key

Note

Does not refresh the cache

Parameters

key (str) – The key to pull out of the network cache

Returns

The deserialized value stored at the key in the cache

load_cache()[source]¶
Returns

refresh_cache() → None[source]¶
refresh_cache()[source]¶

Pull the latest data down from Humble Bundle.

Returns

None

The Humble Bundle API

Humble Bundle API¶

A library for interacting with the Humble Bundle data cache. This is the data cache that Humble Bundle loads client-side when you navigate your products. The goal of this library is to facilitate other tools to be built around the Humble Bundle store, since the web-based index can be limiting. Specifically, I built this library with the intention of making a Calibre plugin for fetching ebooks remotely.
